law.text: KRS 187.290 to 187.620 shall not apply with respect to any motor vehicle owned by the United States, this state or any political subdivision of this state or any municipality therein; nor with respect to any motor vehicle which is subject to the requirements of KRS Chapter 281.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 143, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 33, effective January 1, 1947.
